title: Youthhub
author: Youthhub
content: Hey Userid : 1012477That's email linked to my account.I have made the withdraw Earlier in morning. After 4 hours withdraw got succes but till now i have got any money to bank account. Looks like the IFSC code was wrong so it can't credit to my account and any other account.Please check with back end team they probably received the refund of the transaction (amount 9028 INR)I request you to please check with team and help me to get my refund to my account. It's been over 12 hours now. Since withdraw sucess but i haven't got any money in my bank. Prolly refunded to bcgame but not refunded to my account.Also no reply from support team since now. Please help me to get the refund.I have attached the transaction screenshot. Please answer I can't find nobody from team members they aren't not active and not responding me.

comments.author: Youthhub
comments.body: That's the transaction screenshot. If anybody from team please check and help me.https://ibb.co/qyGPpBNI have not got anything in bank. Please help me with refund.

comments.author: Youthhub
comments.body: Somebody please get me touch with support team of bcgameThey are dead support is not answering to messages. I sent the email no answer from them I dunno what to do now please somebody forward this thread to them and help me to get my withdraw. Dunno whats going on with bcgame

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Youthhub on May 09, 2023, 02:50:22 PMSomebody please get me touch with support team of bcgameThey are dead support is not answering to messages. I sent the email no answer from them I dunno what to do now please somebody forward this thread to them and help me to get my withdraw. Dunno whats going on with bcgame Why are they not responding to your problem? BC.GAME's representative on this forum has been offline for about a month, so you won't get a proper reply here until he comes online. You should continue to contact them with their support team and find a solution.Because the forum representative is offline, his explanation of this complaint will not be available in this community.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Is this reference correct about IFSC? https://www.hdfcbank.com/personal/resources/learning-centre/digital-banking/what-is-an-ifsc-codeNow if you identify the error yourself, how do you draw the conclusion that this is bcgame's fault? If I understand the reference correctly, IFSC should be the user's self-written data in the payment info page. Most casinos can't help mistakes that are basically made by users.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Have you consider the likelyhood of the system need some time to reverse the transaction? I am not familiar with Indian banking system, and since several articles I searched gave me mixed answer, I resort to our latest brand new and still shiny source of information, ChatGPT. To summarize my conversation with... it, the likelyhood of transaction got successfull and credited to a wrong account is about 1%, but it does need several days to reverse the said transaction, suppose it is not credited to a wrong account.Below is the snippet of the conversation:QuoteIt is difficult to estimate the exact percentage of transactions that are wrongly credited due to incorrect IFSC codes, as there are no official statistics on this matter. However, based on anecdotal evidence and reports, it seems that such errors occur in a very small percentage of transactions, possibly less than 1% of all transactions involving IFSC codes.The time taken to reverse a transaction that has been credited to a wrong account due to an incorrect IFSC code can vary depending on a number of factors, including the banks involved, the accuracy of the details provided, and the promptness of the account holder in reporting the error to their bank.[I asked the time needed to process the reversal]In general, the process can take anywhere from a few days to a few weeks to be completed. The account holder who received the funds in error will need to initiate the process of returning the funds to the sender's account, which may involve visiting their bank and providing proof of identity and the erroneous transaction. Once the bank confirms the error and the details of the correct account, they will initiate the reversal process.[...]

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Youthhub on May 09, 2023, 02:40:21 PMI have attached the transaction screenshot. Please answer ~Have you attempted to contact the casino through official channels, and if so, how long has it been since you last contacted their customer support? Keep in mind that customer support may not always be able to provide an immediate response to every issue, particularly if it requires time to investigate and identify the root cause of the problem.Before making any accusations of scamming, it would be prudent to wait until you receive a response from the casino's customer support.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on May 09, 2023, 08:24:40 PM[...] how long has it been since you last contacted their customer support?[...]That's probably the most important part to highlight on this thread, which also why I suggested OP to wait for the system to reverse it. I believe it has not been more than 24 hours since OP reached to bc.games customer support --if OP ever did-- as the transaction itself happened in less than 24 hours ago, as evidenced by the screenshot of the receipt by OP.

comments.author: Youthhub
comments.created_time: May 10, 2023, 03:55:10 AMLast edit: May 11, 2023, 10:43:48 PM by mprep
comments.body: As per gov rules if IFSC is wrong during Transaction. The transaction goes to back to sender. Transaction can't be successed. They somehow sucess my withdraw.But almost a day gone i fot response from bcgame live support neither i have receive my money to bank neither refunded.What i did while withdrawI mentioned pnb (Punjab National bank)Name -Account no.Bank name - Punjab National bankIFSC - wrong Every detail was correct but only IFSC were wrong that mistake also happened coz they auto saved informations (yea my mistake too) but with rest correct information Transaction can't be successed. I talked with bank they all saying talk to sender he got the money back.Quote from: noorman0 on May 09, 2023, 03:19:27 PMIs this reference correct about IFSC? https://www.hdfcbank.com/personal/resources/learning-centre/digital-banking/what-is-an-ifsc-codeNow if you identify the error yourself, how do you draw the conclusion that this is bcgame's fault? If I understand the reference correctly, IFSC should be the user's self-written data in the payment info page. Most casinos can't help mistakes that are basically made by users.How casinos work like this? 20 hours passed i have got no response from live supportScreenshot: https://ibb.co/R9GbWg0They should atleast check and answer me atleast talk with back end team to refund the balance. But nada I don't know where should I can contact. I sent msg to telegram group they saying support only through email or live support.20 hours passed nk response from live supportNo response from email.This is not even weekend. If there staff at off. Dunno really I'm actually worrying about it now Updated:- day 2 And i never recieved yet my money in bank. Neither support replied me since 24 hours no answer.There telegram group is scam/full of scammers/spammersLive support is deadI also saw in group may people got the same problem from 4-5 days there withdraw got success but they also never received the money.So is it they started doing scam? Bc.game is scam? Screenshot talking with another user of bcgame who having same issuehttps://ibb.co/CVVDcVvScreenshot of his Transaction aswell as he never received money in his bank and bcgame support not responding him since 5 days.He withdrew on 5th May and today is 10th may https://ibb.co/FgLyRy3I will update here if i get any response from bcgame support. Becouse they still ignoring me. Successed my withdraw but never sent me payment.And no response from nobody.Untill bc.game as called Scam site. Â Day 3 and already evening now.Bc.game live support never answered contacted them through live support through email through telegram group.Looks like they aren't capable of giving service. And if somebody gets problem they just ignore and enjoy the money BC.GAME HASH.DICE Is officially a scam As they never sent me my withdraw neither responding me if they or their back end got the refund. I unable to contact them from anywhere ..PS- If any of you using bcgame please don't use. Who knows what happen next if you were in my place think about it. Im really tired messaging them waiting for there answer they never responded me. Scam #bcgame[moderator's note: consecutive posts merged]

From 7th to 13 may 2023.Bc support raised a ticket for me.Screenshot:- https://ibb.co/5MHc4P4Welp I hope they as soon as why the issue arrived. comments.author: Youthhub
comments.body: Nah that's not how it's work. IMPS/NEFT usually instant. More it can takes mintues or hours. Maximum 1-2 days (if transaction is pending due to bank side issue) but in that case bc.game should not Mark my transaction as Success/approve. It's been 5 days and u have not received anything. I contacted bank they said "contact the sender he got the refund" becouse they still never received any transaction of 9028 Inr "110 usd" I made other fiat withdraw aswell "once it mark success it just arrives right away" within in sec. Case is not about banking side.Case is about bc.game bank clearly said they never received money of that transaction. So probably bc.game team received the refund (and of course they do manual withdraws ) that's the main problem. So i need help from them so they can check the actual issue and refund the balance to my bc account. As probably they got refund if till now i never got anything.5 days passed since I'm contacting the team.
